name: Vegan Lemon Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting
description: Vegan Lemon Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting. No added refined sugar in those soft and Delicious Lemon Cake! Make into cupcakes, loaf or a sheet pan cake. Vegan Soyfree Recipe, Can be nut-free.  GF option

video.name: Vegan Lemon Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting | VEGAN RICHA RECIPES
video.description:
Vegan Lemon Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting. No added refined sugar. GF option
ðŸ’™ FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/05/vegan-lemon-cake-with-cream-cheese-frosting.html
ðŸ’™ MY COOKBOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz

This Cake is Zesty, lemony, Soft, Moist, Sumerry and everything I want in a Lemon Cake. A super easy Cake with loads of lemon juice and zest covered with 4 ingredient vegan cream cheese frosting. I use kite cream cheese or a cashew based home made cream cheese. A simple glaze with a few tsp lemon juice and half cup powdered sugar will work wonderfully as well. 

It takes just a few minutes to put together and then it is the excruciating wait time to bake, cool and frost! All maple syrup, no refined sugar in the cake or the frosting. The batter can be baked into cupcakes, baked donuts or a loaf like my Cinnamon Swirl Loaf which is getting made every day on Instagram! 
More Cakes: https://www.veganricha.com/?s=cake
Gluten-free Cakes and Baking: https://www.veganricha.com/category/gluten-free/gluten-free-baking

Music: Bensound - Energy

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup maple syrup ((add 1 tbsp sugar for sweeter))
1/3 cup lemon juice (( 1 tbsp more if using whole grain flours))
1/4 cup water (Â or non dairy milk)
2 tbsp almond flour or meal (, or use more flour to make it nutfree)
zest of 1/2 to 1 lemon depending on the size of the lemon and your preference of lemonyness
6 oz vegan cream cheese ((I use kite hill plain almond cream cheese, see notes to make your own cashew cream cheese))
1 - 2 tbsp powdered sugar and 2 drops of vanilla if needed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Mix the wet ingredients in a bowl until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Mix the wet ingredients in a bowl until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the 1 1/4 cup flour and the rest of the dry ingredients and whisk well to make a smooth batter. Add rest of the flour 1 tbsp at a time to make a smooth flowy batter, but not overly watery or overly stiff. You might not need all of the flour if using whole grain flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the 1 1/4 cup flour and the rest of the dry ingredients and whisk well to make a smooth batter. Add rest of the flour 1 tbsp at a time to make a smooth flowy batter, but not overly watery or overly stiff. You might not need all of the flour if using whole grain flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the batter into a lined or greased pan. Even it out using a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the batter into a lined or greased pan. Even it out using a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes if using a square baking dish or brownie pan. If the dish is stoneware, add a few more mins to the baking time. If baking a Loaf: 40 to 50 minutes, Cupcakes: 20 to 25 minutes for cupcakes. Test with a toothpick from the center. It should come out clean. Cool in the pan for 10 mins, then remove and let it cool completely before frosting.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 25 to 30 minutes if using a square baking dish or brownie pan. If the dish is stoneware, add a few more mins to the baking time. If baking a Loaf: 40 to 50 minutes, Cupcakes: 20 to 25 minutes for cupcakes. Test with a toothpick from the center. It should come out clean. Cool in the pan for 10 mins, then remove and let it cool completely before frosting.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the ingredients under frosting until smooth. Add 1-2 tbsp powdered sugar for sweeter frosting. Adjust the tang with lemon zest if needed. Add a drop or so vanilla extract or almond extract for flavor (optional). Chill the frosting for 15 mins if too flowy.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk the ingredients under frosting until smooth. Add 1-2 tbsp powdered sugar for sweeter frosting. Adjust the tang with lemon zest if needed. Add a drop or so vanilla extract or almond extract for flavor (optional). Chill the frosting for 15 mins if too flowy.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the frosting on the cake evenly. Slice and serve. Store refrigerated for upto 4 days. The lemon flavor gets stronger on storing
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the frosting on the cake evenly. Slice and serve. Store refrigerated for upto 4 days. The lemon flavor gets stronger on storing

keywords: lemon cake, spring lemon cake, vegan cream cheese frosting
